subject: Iceweasel artwork rated PG?
body:
Dear list,

looking for some web pages on Iceweasel, I encountered

geticeweasel.org

If you visit this page using Iceweasel, you get a GIF animation of its 
mascot "humping" Mozilla's globe:

http://www.geticeweasel.org/iceweasel_humping.gif

This animation is only shown to people using Iceweasel. 

What do you think about this?
Regards
Ralf


-- 
To UNSUBSCRIBE, email to debian-desktop-REQUEST@lists.debian.org
with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
